properties.name: Toronto Pearson Airport Buffer Zone
properties.description: No-fly zone within 3 nautical miles of Pearson International Airport. Special authorization required.
properties.restrictions: Absolutely no drone operations without special authorization from Transport Canada.

properties.name: Buttonville Airport Area
properties.description: Restricted airspace around Buttonville Municipal Airport.
properties.restrictions: Controlled airspace. Authorization required for drone operations.

properties.name: Toronto Downtown Core
properties.description: Densely populated urban area. Restrictions apply to recreational drone operations.
properties.restrictions: Recreational drones prohibited. Commercial operations require special permits.

properties.name: Canada's Wonderland Special Event Area
properties.description: Temporary flight restrictions during special events and high attendance days.
properties.restrictions: Check for temporary flight restrictions. Avoid flying over crowds.
